content.html: Cleese: Toughen up snowflakes! End cancel culture! You don't have the right not to be offended! Also Cleese: Dear BBC, I am disgusted by the way you audaciously asked me questions about my recent rants and demand some sort of consequence. bbc.com/news/entertain…
content.value:
Cleese: Toughen up snowflakes! End cancel culture! You don't have the right not to be offended!

Also Cleese: Dear BBC, I am disgusted by the way you audaciously asked me questions about my recent rants and demand some sort of consequence.

bbc.com/news/entertain…
